title: LIVE/WORK LOFT SPACE, GREAT LOCATION!! ~WON'T LAST~ (BL206)
posting_body: ['Roughly 1500 sq.ft.', '$3,500/month [includes one parking spot in a gated location]', 'Comes with one free parking spot in a gated lot.', 'Unit 206', 'Available For Move-In', "Perfection is not an option; at Brick Lofts it's the norm.", "Your home's amenities should not be an option either.", 'At Brick Lofts, we provide you with full upgrades, standard.', "Take a look at our long list of included amenities and you'll understand why there is no need for additional upgrade packages.", 'Amenities:', '-Open floor-plans', "-12' - 16' foot Ceilings", '-European Designed Kitchen Cabinetry', '-Harwood Flooring/Concrete on First Floor', '-Exposed Wood Columns', '-Exposed wood ceiling beams', '-Custom Granite Vanities with Modern Sinks and Faucets', '-Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances', '-Exquisite Lighting Fixtures', '-Exposed Brick throughout Building', '-All new dual pane windows', '-Tiled Shower Walls', '-Glass Shower Door Enclosures', '-CAT5/Cable ready', '-Gated', 'For more info and pictures, visit <URL>.', 'Location:', 'Brick Lofts', '652 Mateo Street', 'Los Angeles, CA 90021', 'Walking Distance to Restaurant, Shops, Cafes - Stumptown Coffee, Bread Lounge, Zinc Cafe, Urth Cafe, Church and State, Daily Dose, Pizza Nista, Bestia, Urban Radish etc.', 'Contact Alona at', 'show contact info', 'or via e-mail through this ad for a showing.', '**PICTURES ARE NOT OF EXACT UNIT**', 'Lessee to verify square footage.', 'To see more available units, please visit: <URL>.']
